response.original_title: 濡れて、はしゃいで、ぬくもり求めて寄り添い合って。 所かまわずキスに溺れて感情むき出しで絡み合う濃密レズビアンデート
response.overview: "Rima Arai's Lesbian Debut".  At first, girls made Rima a little uneasy. But after spending time with Ena, she gradually opens her heart… Sunshine followed by rain. When she finds the courage to reveal her true feelings, the noise of the world fades beneath the rain, and the two are enveloped in a secluded space where they seek each other's warmth and share pure pleasure. A raw and honest lesbian documentary, capturing a young woman's emotional debut as she bares herself completely.
response.title: Nurete, hashaide, nukumori motomete yorisoiatte. Tokoro kamawazu kisu ni oborete kanjo mukidashi de karami au nomitsu lesbian date
